title: From Nashville to Tupelo on the Natchez Trace Parkway
description: With no billboards or gas stations, a fall drive along this winding, verdant All-American Road, is a head-clearing journey, offering encounters with history, nature, music and more.
dc:creator: Colleen Creamer

media:content.media:credit: William DeShazer for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Nashville to Tupelo, Miss., is one half of the winding, verdant, 444-mile-long All-American Road known as the Natchez Trace Parkway.
